purpose: To simplify the creation and management of AI workflows and agents for users with minimal coding expertise.
principle: Leverages visual programming and integration with popular AI frameworks like LangChain and OpenAI to enable users to design complex AI workflows.
reusability: Offers a modular design with plug-and-play components, supports integration with various AI models through APIs.
limitations: Primarily focused on AI workflow design; may require additional setup for specific AI model integrations.
name: Flowise
highlight: Visual interface for building and orchestrating AI agents using a low-code/no-code approach.
